com.mlt.mkt.chart.plotter

Class DataPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.mkt.chart.plotter.Plotter
      • com.mlt.mkt.chart.plotter.DataPlotter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarPlotter, CandlestickPlotter, HistogramPlotter, LinePlotter

    public abstract class DataPlotter
extends Plotter
    Base class for data plotters of timed data.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • setColorBearishEven

        public void setColorBearishEven(java.awt.Color colorBearishEven)
        Sets the color used for a bearish line bar candle is an even period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week of the month and for the month of the year.
        Parameters:
        colorBearishEven - The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an even period.

      • setColorBearishOdd

        public void setColorBearishOdd(java.awt.Color colorBearishOdd)
        Sets the color used for a bearish line bar candle is an odd period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week the month and for the month of the year.
        Parameters:
        colorBearishOdd - The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an odd period.

      • setColorBullishEven

        public void setColorBullishEven(java.awt.Color colorBullishEven)
        Sets the color used for a bullish line/bar/candle in an even period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week the month and for the month of the year.
        Parameters:
        colorBullishEven - The color used for a bullish line/bar/candle in an even period.

      • setColorBullishOdd

        public void setColorBullishOdd(java.awt.Color colorBullishOdd)
